name: ERICIS OMEN
description:
Dig, construct, conquer. Expand the rift to Dervoa, the realm of dragons, and bring to mortal lands its queen, Ericis. 

To do so, command your minions to corrupt holy lands and build an epic fortress. Receive minions periodically while constructing defences, and expand the portal to get it large enough for the goddess to cross through.
Be aware: human kingdoms will try their best to stop you and save their home.

Created by: 

José Daniel and Ramon Santos [UFF 2022]
